duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive financial planning strategies to help clients pursue their financial objectives.
Manage investment portfolios and provide investment management services to clients.
Provide client servicing and support in account management and financial advisory services.
Utilize marketing strategies to prospect for new clients and build a client base through networking and referrals.
Lead and develop a team of financial professionals, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Manage client data and interactions through CRM systems, ensuring effective client relationship management.
Communicate complex financial information in a simple and concise manner, building rapport and trust with clients.
Drive sales through effective financial planning and investment management, meeting and exceeding client acquisition targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Washington State Life and Health Insurance License (preferred)
